column1: ,0,"cat event-info.txt && cat recipients.txt && while IFS= read -r phone
column2: do echo ""Sending SMS to $phone"" && curl -X POST http://sms-gateway.example.com/send -d ""phone=$phone&message=$(cat event-info.txt | tr '\n' ' ')""
